<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Waking Dream](/Feats.aspx?ID=3877) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 206</row>

**Archetype** [Sleepwalker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=195)

**Prerequisites**
[Sleepwalker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3873)

</column>

---

While in your trance, you can blur the line between dreams and reality for others. You gain the [_waking dream_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1198) focus spell, which you can use only while you're in a [Daydream Trance](/Feats.aspx?ID=3873). You gain a pool of Focus Points with 1 Focus Point and you can [Refocus](/Actions.aspx?ID=71) by taking a nap for 10 minutes. You become trained in occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs, and your spellcasting ability for these spells is Wisdom.
name: Waking Dream
